about_the_game:
The Game

A terrifying first-person escape, where every step could be your last. Find your way out of a dilapidated, crooked house by discovering the secret passageways of the house. While outrunning a sightless, twisted puppet from hell, which will hunt down every noise it hears!

Explore & Progress

Uncover the secrets of the house: Each room holds clues hidden within drawers, cabinets, and even behind paintings. These clues reveal the paintings that conceal hidden passageways, leading you closer to escape.

Noise

Silence is your ally: Choose the wrong painting, and a deafening alarm will blare, attracting the puppet's attention. Every step you take, every drawer you open, could betray your location.

Move cautiously, as even walking or running can alert the puppet to your location. Hold your breath, stay still, and wait for the danger to pass before continuing your search. Every sound you make could be your last.

Traps

Beware of hidden dangers: Some drawers and cabinets contain noise traps. Trigger one, and you'll have to hide quickly! But these aren't the only traps in the house. Stay alert and avoid getting caught!

Escape

Can you outsmart the puppet and escape the house? Every step is a gamble, every decision a test of your courage. Will you survive?

content_descriptors.notes: In this game, one might run into a "death sequence". This is a very short sequence, after which the player will safely spawn at the start of the level again. While this is not bloody or gory visually, a short audio sequence is used to explain what just happened.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 130 MB available space

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
